name: Bubble Shooter Seasons
description:
Fun and addictive bubble shoot game!
In this game you will take the role of a Panda which is traveling through the different seasons.
From Spring to Summer, Autumn and to the cold Winter.
Clear all the bubbles on the screen and try to get 3 stars on each level.

If you get stuck you always can use some of the boosters to help you out.

Features:

● Hundreds of magical levels.
● 4 different seasons.
● Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels.
● Daily bonus for everyone.
● Collect stars to earn some extra coins.
● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
● iCloud progress sync.

Play this game with your whole family.
